serve.port_in_use_solutions:
Solutions:
  1. Close the program using this port
  2. Use --port to specify another port: ./ClawDeckX serve --port 18792
     (Port will be saved to config, no need to specify again)

guide.node_windows:
Please install Node.js manually:
1. Visit https://nodejs.org/en/download/
2. Download Windows installer (LTS recommended)
3. Run installer and complete installation
4. Restart ClawDeckX
guide.node_macos:
Please install Node.js manually:
Method 1 (Recommended): Use Homebrew
  brew install node@22

Method 2: Official installer
  1. Visit https://nodejs.org/en/download/
  2. Download macOS installer
  3. Run installer

Restart ClawDeckX after installation
guide.node_linux:
Please install Node.js manually:
Method 1: Use package manager
  # Ubuntu/Debian
  curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | sudo -E bash -
  sudo apt-get install -y nodejs

  # Fedora/RHEL
  curl -fsSL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | sudo bash -
  sudo dnf install -y nodejs

Method 2: Use nvm
  curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.39.0/install.sh | bash
  source ~/.bashrc
  nvm install 22

Restart ClawDeckX after installation
guide.node_default: Please visit https://nodejs.org/en/download/ to download and install Node.js
guide.openclaw:
Please install OpenClaw manually:

Method 1 (Recommended): Use npm
  npm install -g openclaw@latest

Method 2: Use official install script
guide.openclaw_footer:
After installation:
  1. Run 'openclaw config set gateway.mode local' to initialize config
  2. Restart ClawDeckX
